name: GMTK-Jam 19, OneHit-KO
description:
Made in collaboration with :
NordicGamer: https://nordicgamer.itch.io/
GameWolf3000: https://gamewolf3000.itch.io/

This is our take on the GMKT-Jam 2019 theme "Only One". In this puzzelRPG, you must use the characters' abilities to destroy your foe in one turn. Figure out what combination of abilities will help you survive until you can unleash your attacks, and then destroy your enemy!
